content:
A mixture of H4SiW12O40·26H2O (0.20 g, 0.07 mmol), Cu(OAc)2·H2O (0.12 g, 0.60 mmol), and bmtm (0.049 g, 0.20 mmol) was dissolved in 10.0 mL of distilled water. When the pH value was adjusted to about 3.5 with 1 M HCl, the mixture was sealed into a 20-mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated to 160 °C in 100 min. The autoclave was kept at 160 °C for 3 days and then slowly cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10 °C/h. Orange needle crystals of 1 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 32% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C20H36Cu4N32O42S8SiW12: C, 5.80; H, 0.87; N, 10.82. Found: C, 5.73; H, 0.85; N, 10.95. IR (KBr pellet, cm−1): 3672(s), 2360(s), 1672(w), 1508(m), 1400(s), 1222(m), 1180(s), 1012(m), 968(s), 920(s), 883(m), 800(s).

Synthesis of [Cu<sub>4</sub>(bmte)<sub>3.5</sub>(SiW<sub>12</sub>O<sub>40</sub>)] (<bold>2</bold>)

Compound 2 was prepared in a manner similar to that for 1, but the ligand bmte (0.052 g, 0.20 mmol) was used instead of bmtm. The pH was adjusted to about 4.2 with 1 M HCl. After the mixture was cooled to room temperature, orange block crystals of 2 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 40% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C21H35Cu4N28O40S7SiW12: C, 6.25; H, 0.87; N, 9.72. Found: C, 6.21; H, 0.92; N, 9.80. IR (KBr pellet, cm−1): 3435(s), 1627(s), 1471(m), 1404(s), 1180(s), 1012(m), 972(s), 921(s), 883(m), 800(s).

Synthesis of [Cu<sub>4</sub>(bmtp)<sub>4</sub>(SiW<sub>12</sub>O<sub>40</sub>)] (<bold>3</bold>)

Compound 3 was prepared in a manner similar to that for 1, but the ligand bmtp (0.060 g, 0.20 mmol) was used instead of bmtm. The pH was adjusted to about 4.2 with 1 M HCl. After the mixture was cooled to room temperature, pale-green crystals of 3 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 38% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C36H64Cu4N32O40S8SiW12: C, 9.98; H, 1.48; N, 10.35. Found: C, 9.86; H, 1.36; N, 10.43. IR (KBr pellet, cm−1): 2360(s), 1635(w), 1404(s), 1276(m), 1188(s), 1010(m), 968(s), 921(s), 883(m), 798(s).
clean_text:
Synthesis of [Cu4(bmtm)4(SiW12O40)]⋅2H2O (1)

A mixture of H4SiW12O40⋅26H2O (0.20 g, 0.07 mmol), Cu(OAc)2⋅H2O (0.12 g, 0.60 mmol), and bmtm (0.049 g, 0.20 mmol) was dissolved in 10.0 mL of distilled water. When the pH value was adjusted to about 3.5 with 1 M HCl, the mixture was sealed into a 20-mL Teflon-lined autoclave and heated to 160 °C in 100 min. The autoclave was kept at 160 °C for 3 days and then slowly cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10 °C/h. Orange needle crystals of 1 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 32% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C20H36Cu4N32O42S8SiW12: C, 5.80; H, 0.87; N, 10.82. Found: C, 5.73; H, 0.85; N, 10.95. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3672(s), 2360(s), 1672(w), 1508(m), 1400(s), 1222(m), 1180(s), 1012(m), 968(s), 920(s), 883(m), 800(s).

Synthesis of [Cu4(bmte)3.5(SiW12O40)] (2)

Compound 2 was prepared in a manner similar to that for 1, but the ligand bmte (0.052 g, 0.20 mmol) was used instead of bmtm. The pH was adjusted to about 4.2 with 1 M HCl. After the mixture was cooled to room temperature, orange block crystals of 2 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 40% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C21H35Cu4N28O40S7SiW12: C, 6.25; H, 0.87; N, 9.72. Found: C, 6.21; H, 0.92; N, 9.80. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3435(s), 1627(s), 1471(m), 1404(s), 1180(s), 1012(m), 972(s), 921(s), 883(m), 800(s).

Synthesis of [Cu4(bmtp)4(SiW12O40)] (3)

Compound 3 was prepared in a manner similar to that for 1, but the ligand bmtp (0.060 g, 0.20 mmol) was used instead of bmtm. The pH was adjusted to about 4.2 with 1 M HCl. After the mixture was cooled to room temperature, pale-green crystals of 3 were filtered and washed with distilled water (yield of about 38% based on W). Elem anal. Calcd for C36H64Cu4N32O40S8SiW12: C, 9.98; H, 1.48; N, 10.35. Found: C, 9.86; H, 1.36; N, 10.43. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 2360(s), 1635(w), 1404(s), 1276(m), 1188(s), 1010(m), 968(s), 921(s), 883(m), 798(s).
